d51pearpkg2.name: Phing_d51pearkpkg2
d51pearpkg2.summary: An alternative to phing's default pearpkg2
d51pearpkg2.description: This package provides an alternative to phing's bundled pearpkg2, allowing for a build script that more closely resembles a real package.xml2.0 file or using the API that is available by using PEAR_PackageFileManager2.
d51pearpkg2.notes: This package allows creating package.xml2.0 files in a less abstract way by mimicing the actual package.xml2.0 spec or the API for PEAR_PackageFileManager2 where it is more concise.
